title: Modern Scandinavian Apartment with Fireplace in a Quiet Nowy Sacz Suburb
description: Soak in the warm light in this 3-bedroom, 2-bath apartment drawing on minimalist Scandinavian influences. The open floor plan welcomes you with smooth blonde wood, soundproof walls, and a statement fireplace. The recently updated kitchen features high-end appliances and clean lines, while the master bedroom boasts an ensuite bathroom. The layout balances function and cosiness in 93 sqm, making the most of its tranquil surroundings.
neighborhood_description: Located in the peaceful Suburb neighborhood of Nowy Sacz, this home benefits from a relaxed atmoshpere and a safe, community-focused environment. Excellent access to major highways keeps city amenities within easy reach, all while you enjoy the slower pace and quiet streets. Ideal for those who appreciate nature and friendly local connections.
lifestyle_benefits: plenty of space for remote work or hobbies
ideal setting for young couples seeking calm after bustle
easy highway routes for quick escapes or commuting
target_buyer: Perfect for young couples searching for stylish tranquility without sacrificing access to the city; also fitting for first-time homebuyers valuing both connection and privacy.
market_positioning: A well-appointed and competitively priced apartment, standing out in Nowy Sacz's suburban market for its blend of minimalist style, modern comforts, and rare amenities in a low-urban, community-focused location.
